game.name: Folklore Fishing
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 마우스 전용 옵션, 게임 메뉴 음성 안내, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Folklore Fishing is a story driven fishing game that is fully playable without visuals.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Folklore Fishing is a story driven fishing game that is fully playable without visuals.
